article_title: Think Tanks Rather Than Lobbying Tanks

article_metadata.description: Last week, the leaders of the most relevant think tanks in North America attended a meeting to discuss the major challenges they face today. Learn what was discussed.
article_metadata.author: Alejandro Chafuen
